outputs.output_descr: Uzbekistan's obligations under the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) integrated into its national development and sectoral planning frameworks through a renewed and participative 'biodiversity planning' and strategizing process, aligning the results of the process to the global guidance contained in the CBD's Strategic Plan for 2011-2020.

project_descr: National Biodiversity Planning to Support the implementation of the Convention on Biological Diversity 2011-2020 Strategic Plan in Uzbekistan
